name: minimize
effect: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
short_effect: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

flavor_text.black-white: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
